nodes.text: Farlie was an Imperial cook stationed by the Galactic Empire at the Krake Data Vault on Krake's Planet, shortly following the Battle of Hoth.
Farlie was known for his soups and his spicy peppermash. He often allowed higher ranked Imperial officers to eat in his kitchen on paydays, so they could avoid busy rushes.

Farlie was present when Luke Skywalker and Chewbacca entered the vault to tap into the central databank through the kitchen terminal for information on Shira Brie that could clear the murder charges put on him for the death of Brie.
Chewbacca held Farlie in a headlock while they watched the file on Shira.
After Luke destroyed the vault, Farlie was killed in the explosion.
Farlie was created by David Michelinie and Walter Simonson & Tom Palmer.
